narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Alessa Lerma is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Brownsville, TX. From 2020-10 through 2021-09, this provider received $464K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 999 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.7× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $83 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 75th percentile.
99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $98K in 2020 to $366K in 2021 (272% growth).
Saw a 3.7× spike in 2021 ($98K → $366K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2021-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
